# scrollerWidth(for:scrollerStyle:)

**Type Method**

Returns the width for scrollers of the receiving class for a given control size and scroller style.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class func scrollerWidth(for controlSize: NSControl.ControlSize, scrollerStyle: NSScroller.Style) -> CGFloat
```

## Parameters

- **controlSize**: A control size.
- **scrollerStyle**: A scroller style.

## Return Value

The width for scrollers of the receiving class for `controlSize` and `scrollerStyle`.

## Discussion

You should use this method in preference to [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScroller/scrollerWidthForControlSize:], which assumes a scroller style of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScroller/Style/legacy], and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScroller/scrollerWidth] which in addition assumes a control size of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSRegularControlSize].

## Determining Scroller Size

- **controlSize**: The size of the scroller.
